alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:01AM MST until December 24 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 2 inches, mainly along Raton Pass and Sugarite Canyon. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-25. Blowing snow may reduce visibility below one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
